labels.label:
{ "from" : 1, "to" : 100, "currentPage" : 1, "total" : 4842, "totalPages" : 49, "queryTime" : "0.013", "totalTime" : "0.029", "partial" : false, "canonicalUrl" : "/v1/categories?show=id,name,subCategories.id,subCategories.name&pageSize=100&format=json&apiKey=qhqws47nyvgze2mq3qx4jadt", "categories" : [ { "id" : "abcat0010000", "name" : "Gift Ideas", "subCategories" : [ { "id" : "pcmcat1496256957402", "name" : "Top Tech Gifts" },
1. EvaluateJsonPath : takes the currentPage & totalPages attribute
2. RouteOnAttribute : use property(notLast) to check if currentPage == totalPages
loop
3. UpdateAttribute : if notLast property is unmatched then currentPage+1
4. SplitJason : send both unmatched & notLast to the splitJason
